content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ** ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ the taylor swift-inspired granny dress is a huge internet sensation but what if a granny dress isn t your jam how about a granny bag all we need to do for this bag is create a rectangle using the granny stitch then we will create a fold make two seams and add a handle this bag pattern includes a video tutorial 1 crochet hook g 4 0mm - or size to meet gauge 2 notions removable stitch marker 3 yarn needle to weave in ends 4 scissors 5 faux leather snap optional 6 bag strap brown 7 bag strap beige 8 yarn lily sugar n cream 9 100% acrylic 246yds/100g yardage 350 yds - for solid bag 3 balls - for taylor swift-inspired bag 2 balls main color 1 ball each coordinating colors abbreviations chain - chain blo - back loop only double_crochet - double_crochet single_crochet - single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s - stitch es gauge 15 sts x 9 row unblocked= 4x4 in granny stitch pattern not sure what gauge is check out this blog post what is crochet gauge and how to fix it sizes one size -
